Class Database

  • java.lang.Object
    • Database
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Iterable<Media>

    public class Database
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Iterable<Media>
    Project #3 CS 2334, Section 010 March 28, 2016

    The Database class contains all of the methods and data necessary to load data on MediaMakers and Media.

    Version:
    1.0
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

         throws java.io.IOException

        Parameters:
        movieFile - File containing data on Movies.
        TVFile - File containing data on Series and Episodes.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - throws an IO exception

      • search

        public Database search(java.lang.String title,
                       Year year,
                       boolean[] search)
        Searches this Database for Media matching the given title and year as specified by the boolean array search.
        Parameters:
        title - The string representing the desired title.
        year - The Year object representing the desired year(s).
        search - A boolean array specifying the desired type of search. The data should be true if the search should include a search of: {Movies, Series, Episodes, Titles, Years, Partial titles}.
        Returns:
        A Database object containing all Media from this Database which matches the specifications of the search.

      • partialSearch

        private Database partialSearch(java.lang.String title,
                               Year year,
                               boolean[] search)
        Performs a search for partial title matches in this Database to the provide title, as well as limiting by year if applicable.
        Parameters:
        title - The title or partial title to search for.
        year - The year(s) searched for.
        search - A boolean array specifying the type of search to perform.
        Returns:
        A Database object containing all Media from this Database which matches the specifications of the search.

      • exactSearch

        private Database exactSearch(java.lang.String title,
                             Year year,
                             boolean[] search)
        Performs a search for exact matches to the provided title in this Database as well as limiting by year if applicable.
        Parameters:
        title - The exact title to search for.
        year - The year(s) searched for.
        search - A boolean array specifying the type of search to perform.
        Returns:
        A Database object containing all Media from this Database which matches the specifications of the search.

      • yearSearch

        private Database yearSearch(Year year,
                            boolean[] search)
        Performs a search of this Database for media produced in the specified year(s).
        Parameters:
        year - The year(s) searched for.
        search - search A boolean array specifying the type of search to perform.
        Returns:
        A Database object containing all Media from this Database which matches the specifications of the search.
